function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differences in attitudes toward urban green spaces based on cultural background and environmental factors","Impact":"Misunderstanding and mismanagement of urban green spaces, leading to dissatisfaction and conflict among citizens","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough cultural and environmental impact assessments before implementing changes to urban green spaces","Technologies":"Cultural impact assessments, environmental impact assessments","People":"Citizens, urban planners, government bodies","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, government bodies"},{"Description":"Changes in citizens' behavior and perceptions of urban green spaces in response to external events","Impact":"Unpredictable and potentially negative changes in the utilization and management of urban green spaces","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring of citizen behavior and perceptions, rapid response to identified changes, and proactive communication with the public","Technologies":"Data analytics, citizen feedback mechanisms","People":"Citizens, urban planners, researchers","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 on citizens' behavior and perceptions of urban green spaces","Impact":"Shifts in the way urban green spaces are used and perceived, impacting overall well-being and community dynamics","Mitigation":"Implementing guidelines for safe usage of urban green spaces, promoting awareness of the benefits of outdoor activities, and providing necessary amenities for safety","Technologies":"Public health guidelines, communication technology for awareness campaigns","People":"Citizens, public health authorities, urban planners","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planning authorities"}]}
